mapper.sql: TAXREGCODE, TAXPAYERVER, TAXPAYERNAME, SHORTNAME, TAXPAYERORGID, TAXPAYERID, JURPNAME, IDTYPECODE, JURPID, REGTYPECODE, SUBJECTRELATIONCODE, DEPRECIATIONCODE, GBTRADECODE, MANAGECODE, MANAGEDOUBULECODE, BUDGETLEVELCODE, ACCOUNTINGMODECODE, ISSINGLETAX, ENTERPRISESORTCODE, TOWNSFLAG, PRACTICEDATE, EADATE, TAXPAYERTYPECODE, HOLDTYPECODE, TAXPAYERSTATUSCODE, MAINBUSIDESC, SIDEBUSIDESC, EMPLOYEEQTY, INCOMERESIDECODE, LEVYCODE, CHECKATTRIBUTE, TAXOFFICIALCODE, SOCTAXPAYERFLAG, SUBSTITUTEORG, INSERTDEPTCODE, INSERTSTAFFCODE, ACCEPTDATE, SOCTAXPAYERSTATUS, SOCTAXPAYERAPPDATE, ISFREIGHTDOFOR, FREIGHTINCOME, PERSONALFEETYPE, CANTONCODE, PROVINBRANCHTYPECODE, FIRSTACCEPTDATE
mapper.select:
select
from TB_REG_TAXPAYERBASICINFO where 1=1
and TAXPAYERNAME like '%${svo.taxpayername}%'

select
distinct
from TB_REG_TAXPAYERBASICINFO
order by ${orderByClause}
